description: Veggie Hair removal powder is 100% ayurvedic and removes even the smallest hair.
It contains a mix of subtle and bold shades, which can be worn according to the occasion. You can choose from the most loved nail color categories such single stoke, Glossy, matt, glitter, metalic

La-promise veggie lipstick is 100% pure herbal and vegetarian range of moisturizing lip color available in 35 rich, sophisticated shades including peaches, pink, and nutty browns. It contains caster boil, parafin wax, beez wax, LLP oil, preservatives oil, pigments.

la-promise veggie compact powder for dry skin has satiny, smooth texture and adds glow and radiance to the skin , for combination skin reduces porees, evens out skin tone, controls excess oil and sets makeup. This compact powder for fair skin can be used dry as a compact to get naturally flawless skin. it includes talc powder, keoline, titanium dioxide, binder, flavour.

la-promise veggie lip balm contains highly active moisturising fromula along with natural fruit extracts to care and nourish the lips instantly . Helps to repair dry, cracked and chapped lips and makes them look healthy and smooth.
Removes nail color quickly and gently.
Veggie La- Promise comfort liquid foundation is long wear and provides effortless spread renders flawless, natural finish, allow skin to breath without clogging pores.

Veggie La-Promise Kajal is one stroke highly pigmented kajal and free of paraffin and preservatives. It is suited for waterline and is waterproof. It has a velvety soft texture and also suited for those who wear contact lenses.
Veggie La-Promise Eyeliners are deep black and smooth. It glides on really well and its firm tip helps to apply easily on the eyelids.
Veggie Dishwash Liquid is for all purpose dishwashing formula infused with lemon enabling anti bacterial properties, grease cutting power for faster removal.

Veggie Floor Cleaner removes grease and ensure to clean any floor like marble, ceramic, mosaic, cement, granite, kotah stone, tiles, vinyl floor, etc. It maintains natural reflection, glow and provides shining to the floor instantly.

Veggie Handwash is enriched with pure coconut oil. This  gentle liquid lathers smoothly over your hands, cleanse, moisturises and leaves your skin fresh with its fragrance while fighting 100% germs and bacteria.
Veggie Hanging Soap lathers smoothly over your hands, cleanse, moisturises and leaves your skin fresh with its fragrance while fighting 100% germs and bacteria.
Veggie Glass Cleaner comes with a unique formula that provides extra shine and is eco-friendly. It quickly eliminates fingerprints, smudges, dust and dirt.

With contents such as Palm Oil and coconut oil, Veggie Laundry Soap leaves the clothes stain free, hands soft and is safe for baby clothes. A single soap works like 3 soaps. Does not unnecessarily disolve in water when left unused.

Veggie Phenyl is ideal for floor, Toilet, Wash basin, etc. Its special formula cleans stubborn stains and leaves the area sparkling clean with a pine fragrance. It is biodegrabale and absolutely safe on skin.
Veggie Toilet Cleaner removes tough stains, deodorises quickly and fights odour.

Veggie LISA washing powder removes even the toughest stains by getting deep down into the clothes and preventing them from setting in. Work great for Bucket wash, Top load washing machine and front load washing machines.
Contains pleasant perfume, optical brightener. Removes oil and grease from clothes. Keeps hands safe and soft.
veggies burn stick contains plastic bristle, vinegar, baking soda  which is used as cleaning agent and works effectively in getting rid of crusty burnt food from the pans.
